thread.title: How Gonzaga Went From Glass Slipper to Glass Ceiling

author: Jared Diamond
title: How Gonzaga Went From Glass Slipper to Glass Ceiling
text:
Gonzaga was minutes away from finishing the regular season as college basketballâ€™s only undefeated team. The team led BYU by 12 in the second half of a game it was favored to win by 20. Then the Bulldogs crumbled.

The loss likely awakened the demons that haunt Gonzaga this time of year. Despite nearly two decades of almost unrivaled winning, fans have grown accustomed to watching one of the best teams in the country wither away when... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
